data.persona: I was once dead.  I have come to life. I am feared by children.
data.description:
You are in the Entrance to church.
The entrance to the church can only be described as a bit scary.  It is overgrown with mosses and weeds.  It has not been taken care of and is a mixture of wood and stone.  It is dirty, and things live here.
There's a weed, a Gravestone, a ghost, and a moss here.
The trolls and the animal are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a flannel shirt and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to ensure my flannel shirt is not torn
data.mid_motivation: I want to fight the trolls for the animal today
data.long_motivation: I hope to survive the coming winter by eating brains of animals and Trolls
